meanings.definition: Extremely large or immense in size.
meanings.sent1: The supercolossal cake towered over the table.
meanings.sent2: The supercolossal mountain was a majestic sight.
meanings.sent3: The supercolossal sandwich was too big to fit in my mouth!
meanings.sent4: The supercolossal waves crashed against the shore with great force.
meanings.sent5: The supercolossal elephant stood out among the other animals at the zoo.

meanings.sent1: The supercolossal impact of the news left everyone speechless.
meanings.sent2: The supercolossal storm caused widespread damage.
meanings.sent3: The supercolossal traffic jam made everyone late for work.
meanings.sent4: The supercolossal responsibility weighed heavily on his shoulders.
meanings.sent5: The supercolossal explosion echoed through the valley.

meanings.sent1: The supercolossal whale gracefully swam through the ocean.
meanings.sent2: The supercolossal tree provided shade for the entire park.
meanings.sent3: The supercolossal ice cream cone was a challenge to finish.
meanings.sent4: The supercolossal task seemed daunting at first.
meanings.sent5: The supercolossal spaceship launched into the sky with a roar.
